import { faLaravel } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function Experience() { const [experiences, setExperiences] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/experiences") .then((res) => res.json()) .then( (result) => { setExperiences(result); }, (error) => {} ); }, []); return (

Experience

{experiences?.map(experience=>{

Laravel Developer

Kumberland Inc.

Feb. 21 - August 21
Kumberland is an Ontario-based company that offers outsourced services including Marketing, and Web Development solutions in Canada and the Caribbean.
})}
); } export default Experience;
